item.title: Watch Live: Bryan Kohberger to be formally sentenced for Idaho murders
item.description: The families of Ethan Chapin, Xana Kernodle, Madison Mogen and Kaylee Goncalves will read victim impact statements before Bryan Kohberger is sentenced...

item.title: 6/18: CBS Morning News
item.description: President Trump considering joining Israel in strikes on Iranian nuclear sites, sources say; U.S. schools appear to be improving since pandemic.

item.title: Hershey to increase candy prices by double digits as cocoa costs rise
item.description: Hershey said the price hike is related to cost of cocoa, which has increased exponentially in recent years.

item.title: 7/23: CBS Morning News
item.description: President Trump accuses former President Obama of treason; General Motors' profit shrinks $1.1 billion after taking tariff hit.

item.title: Zelenskyy faces protests over changes to Ukraine anti-corruption agencies
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is facing protests and EU criticism for the first time since Russia invaded, over changes to national anti-cor...
